name: FruitDeepLinks - Prime Video v2.0 (FireTV and AndroidTV)
author: bnhf
description: Prime Video for FruitDeepLinks with select for User and tuning to the Live feed. Compatible with FireTV and AndroidTV devices.
tune_commands: am start -n $(dumpsys package '||TARGET_PACKAGE_NAME||' 2>/dev/null | awk '/https:/{getline; print $2; exit}') -d '||TARGET_URL_OR_IDENTIFIER||'
post_playback_start_commands: test -z '$(getprop ro.build.version.fireos)' && ( input keyevent KEYCODE_DPAD_CENTER; sleep 3 )
